00058 // Errors
00059 #define _FACDD  0x876
00060 #define MAKE_DDHRESULT( code )  MAKE_HRESULT( 1, _FACDD, code )
00061 
00062 enum _D3DXERR {
00063     D3DXERR_CANNOTMODIFYINDEXBUFFER     = MAKE_DDHRESULT(2900),
